docs.snippet: To the United States Senate the death of Hon. DAVID C. BRODERICK was yesterday announced, by Senator HAUN, of California, who spoke of the departed Senator in terms of high eulogy. Messrs. SEWARD, CRITTENDEN, FOSTER, FOOT and TOOMBS also added their...
docs.lead_paragraph: To the United States Senate the death of Hon. DAVID C. BRODERICK was yesterday announced, by Senator HAUN, of California, who spoke of the departed Senator in terms of high eulogy. Messrs. SEWARD, CRITTENDEN, FOSTER, FOOT and TOOMBS also added their ardent panegyrics, after which the Senate adjourned.

docs.snippet: It was known that the Mayor had sent in to the Aldermen two more nominations for President of the Croton Board and Health Commissioner, and there were a great many spectators in the lobby when the Board met last evening.

headline.main: CITY GOVERNMENT.; BOARD OF ALDERMEN. RELIEF FOR THE ELM-STREET SUFFERERS--PROPOSED REWARD FOR THE DETECTION OF THE MURDERER OF TUERS--DONATIONS TO CHURCHES--A SUDDEN ADJOURNMENT. THE BOARD OF COUNCILMEN. WIDENING AND EXTENDING STREETS--CONDITION OF THE SINKING FUND--SECURITY FOR RESIDENTS IN TENEMENT HOUSES.

docs.lead_paragraph: It was known that the Mayor had sent in to the Aldermen two more nominations for President of the Croton Board and Health Commissioner, and there were a great many spectators in the lobby when the Board met last evening.

headline.main: MATTERS IN MISSOURI.; The Political Cauldron--A Social Oasis--Mr. Raymond's Lecture--Great Success and Reengagement--A Screw Loose in the post-office--Amusements--Sallie St. Clair --The German Drama--An Editor--Actor, &c., &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS, MO., Saturday, Feb. 4, 1860. As the machinery at Washington has happily been started again, and the rival Conventions are approaching, the political cauldron of this State will soon be bubbling away with excess of caloric, throwing off, it is to be hoped, much of the scum which too often contrives to keep itself at the top of the kettle.

headline.main: From Our Albany Correspondent.; WOMEN'S RIGHTS BEING RECOGNIZED--NEW COMMISSIONERS FOR THE QUARANTINE ESTABLISHMENT--A COURT OF CLAIMS--THE STATE AGRICULTURAL SOCIETY--THE MEDICAL DITTO-THE HARDSHELLS--EXECUTIVE SESSION, &C.

docs.snippet: Dr. PERCY has enjoyed the use of our columns for the purpose of correcting the injustice which he alleges was done to him in our review of the New-York Academy's last report on Swillmilk. The only aim of that review was to show that it was...
docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. PERCY has enjoyed the use of our columns for the purpose of correcting the injustice which he alleges was done to him in our review of the New-York Academy's last report on Swillmilk. docs.snippet: The subjoined letter, addressed by Mr. RIVES to a friend, on the important public questions of the day, has been handed to us for publication, and we take pleasure in laying it before our readers:

headline.main: THE NATIONAL CRISIS.; Sensible and Sagacious Letter from Hon. William C. Rives, of Virginia.

docs.lead_paragraph: The subjoined letter, addressed by Mr. RIVES to a friend, on the important public questions of the day, has been handed to us for publication, and we take pleasure in laying it before our readers:

docs.snippet: The introduction of cheap Burgundy and claret into Great Britain, under the Emperor NAPOLEON'S free trade programme, will effect, no doubt, as great a change in the drinking habits of Englishmen as was brought about by the commercial treaties with...
docs.lead_paragraph: The introduction of cheap Burgundy and claret into Great Britain, under the Emperor NAPOLEON'S free trade programme, will effect, no doubt, as great a change in the drinking habits of Englishmen as was brought about by the commercial treaties with Spain and Portugal fifty years ago. At the beginning of the present century, claret was more generally used at the tables

docs.snippet: The bill to compel the attendance of witnesses before Common Councils was ordered to a third reading. It repeals the law made in 1855 for the City of New-York.
docs.lead_paragraph: The bill to compel the attendance of witnesses before Common Councils was ordered to a third reading. It repeals the law made in 1855 for the City of New-York.
